College of Arts and Science Core Curriculum
College of Arts and Science Core Curriculum

Information on the core curriculum for the College of Arts and Science. It includes information on study away programs, teaching opportunities, people, and the program in general. The website also has course descriptions for the core classes (Quantitative Reasoning, Physical Science, Life Science, Natural Science, Conversations of the West, Text and Ideas, World Cultures, Cultures and Contexts, Societies and the Social Sciences, Expressive Culture, and Global Academic Centers) dating back to 2001.
